DOC.detailed_description: Anabolic androgenic steroid include list ban substance sport World Anti-Doping Agency ( WADA ) ability improve performance athlete . Testosterone glucuronization UGT2B17 isoenzyme ( Uridine Diphosphate Glucuronyltransferase 2B17 ) inhibit vitro green tea flavonols like epicatechin , epigallocatechin gallate ( EGCG ) catechin gallate . Therefore diet rich green tea could interfere androgen ' glucuronization cause change steroid profile athlete could consider false positive . A clinical trial design assess change steroid profile healthy volunteer green tea consumption conduct . Subjects different UGT2B17 genotype recruit ( 10 type : ins/ins , ins/del , del/del ) study genotype modulate result obtain . Urine sample obtain 7 day green tea consumption use compare steroid profile . Blood sample also collect assess EGCG pharmacokinetics .
